description: This is a Flutter Dart file defining a stateful widget 'TransactionsScreen' that manages and displays a list of financial transactions. It includes functionality for loading transactions from an API, adding new transactions via a form, and handling loading/error states.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget that displays a list of financial transactions and allows adding new transactions.

classes.name: _TransactionsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the logic for 'TransactionsScreen', including data fetching, input handling, and UI updates.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Fetches the list of transactions from the API and updates the UI.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates a new transaction by sending data from input controllers to the API, then reloads the transaction list.

methods.name: _money
methods.description: Formats a numeric value into a currency string with a dollar sign.
